name: Verify Camera System Shows No Scannable Objects in 0b
description: Validates that the camera system in region 0b displays 0/0 and no scannable objects are detected.
testObjective: Confirm camera system correctly indicates no scannable objects in region 0b.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Interact with the camera system in the cockpit
Observe the display in the top right corner
steps.expected: Display shows '0/0' indicating no scannable objects available

steps.action: Pan camera view around to search for planets or objects
steps.expected: No planets or scannable objects are detected in the view

postconditions: Camera system confirms no scannable content in region 0b
